pageContext.description:
A view from The Old Bridge with the Bishops residence on the right and part of the Left Bank Village on the left.

Original watercolour, image size 17" x 7.75".

(Original Watercolour SOLD)

The signed, embossed limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £45
